title: Senior planner/Planning Engineer
skills: Responsible, purposeful, communicative, ability to define priorities and solve problem issues individually, organizational and managerial abilities, persistent, creative approach for solving tasks assigned, team player, success oriented, easy learner

experience.description:
Разработка процедуры планирования
Составление бюджета компании
Подготавливать графики, отражающие работы, которые должны быть предприняты в соответствии со структурой разбивки работ.
Вводить данные по трудовым ресурсам в графики для создания гистограмм по количеству трудовых ресурсов и кривой по запланированным трудовым ресурсам.
Выполнять и обновлять еженедельный отчёт о выполненных работах.
Выполнять расчёты по статистическому отчёту о выполненных работах и производительности труда.
Выполнять периодические обновления графиков для отражения прогресса и воздействия любых тенденций изменения или колебаний.
Выполнять периодические проверки графиков и отчётов о ходе выполнения работ для выявления тенденций к изменениям, колебаний или проблемных вопросов.
Оказывать помощь руководству проекта в разработке корректировочных мер.
Еженедельно обновлять регистр изменений.
По необходимости оказывать помощь в составлении уведомлений о потенциальных изменениях и распоряжений о внесении изменений.
Выполнять специальные оценки и анализы по планированию и затратам

Development of planning procedures
Budgeting 
Prepare schedules to reflect the work to be undertaken in line with the required Work Breakdown Structure.
Undertake resource loading of schedules in order to produce manpower histograms and Planned “S” curve.
Prepare and update on a weekly basis a Progress Calculation Report
Undertake calculation of progress and productivity statistics.
Undertake periodic updates of schedules to show progress and impact of any trends or variations.
Undertake regular reviews of the schedules and progress reports to identify any trends, variations or concerns.
Assist Project Management in developing corrective action.
Update the trend register on a weekly basis.
Assist in preparing PVN’s and Change Orders as required.
Undertake adhoc reviews and analysis

industries.name: Commercial Property Construction (Retail Spaces, Office Buildings)
Construction of Oil and Gas Industry Facilities

experience.description:
Responsibilities

	Managing and conducting of works accomplishment in Planning Department
	Development of necessary documentation, provision of reasonable use of material, financial and technical means of the company
	Revelation and usage of production reserves with the purpose of achieving better work effects of the enterprise
	Developing of system of encodings, regulations and accounting and its reduction into integrated, universal and clear form
o	Conducting project planning works with the use of procedural and organizational documents like: SNiP of RoK, ENiR of RoK, project management manual RMVOK 2004, works production methods and other regulatory documents
o	Planning and tracing of works at SGP and SGI industrial sites of Tengizchevroil LLP (construction of industrial designs, petroleum trunk lines, processing lines)
o	Acquaintance with project documentation (Drawings, job packs and etc.)
o	Compiling of work breakdown structure in accordance with technical documentation and calculations provided by cost estimating department and project manager
o	Developing of works production network schedules of different levels allowing for optimizing of time outlays, using of reserves and expenses under deadlines 
o	Scheduling of source move histograms, scheduling of charts, work progress calculations in agreement with preproduction department and responsible person for construction works 
o	Preparing reports on the basis of technical requirements of the customer
o	Controlling of works production provided in compliance with target plan approved by customer
o	Participating in production meeting provided by customers
o	Regular visiting construction sites for detailed analysis of technology and specific features of works production
o	Assigning information on progress of completed works in percentage to cost accounting department
o	Revelation of work delay and outstripping ahead of schedule; finding of technical solutions for increasing of production rates and reducing delays
o	Developing of schedules and diagrams, preparing of legal documentation, filling in questionnaire forms for participating in tenders provided by: TENGIZCHEVROIL, AGIP KCO, KATCO, NCPOC and others
o	Conducting of « Sulfur Expansion Project treatment Unit-600, Unit-500» project and civil works (Tengizchevroil):
o	Updating of completed works progress on industrial sites 
o	Scheduling of progress reports according to Tengizchevroil company requirements 
o	Arranging of meetings with customers on project control works
o	Controlling of cost centre 
o	Scheduling of timesheets, preparing and endorsement for billing issues to customers (Lump Sum Invoice)
o	Participating in Turnaround works 2010 at SGP and SGI

o	Conducting and control of timely works production on the projects (Customer if Tengizchevroil LLP):
o	Gas Utilization Project (GUP) - (Unit-800, civil and mechanical works)
o	Crude Tank Farm - construction of reservoir Т22 for storing crude oil
o	Final civil works at CTF project
o	Weekly network schedule update
o	Weekly progress update of completed works provided on the industrial sites 
o	Preparing of weekly progress reports on works completed 
o	Providing weekly meetings with customers on project control issues
o	Scheduling of monthly project timesheet reports and issuing invoices to customers
o	Projects completion
